synopsis: Maki-Sensei catches "cute moments" from some of her students.
Hana-chan schools her class mates in proper baking etiquette.

title.jp: Autumn is the Season for Reading

synopsis: There's nothing like a good book on a fall afternoon! And a good book is just what Mayu wants, but can she find something that can draw her in?
Delusional Oono-kun's dream comes true when his new seat puts him right next to Mayu! He wants to get closer to her, but can fantasy become reality?
The girls decide to have a slumber party at the Morita house, and Mayu wants to girl talk about romance.

title.jp: Autumn is the Season of Love?

synopsis: Unable to contain his passion any longer, one of Ritsuki's juniors musters up his courage and confesses his love. Unfortunately, when he opens his eyes, it's Mayu that's standing there.
Student teacher Hama-sensei is taking over Mayu's class, and Mayu's blank stare has the new teacher worried about her.
Class 2-3 decides to hold a flea market for the school Culture Festival.  The four girls...whoa, what'd they bring?!
Mayu's got plans to hang out with her friends, but she's stuck at home sick in bed. With the quiet Morita-san weakened and further silenced by her cold, what can she do?!

title.jp: It is Amiable to be Careless

synopsis: Mayu and the girls get worried when Miki doesn't show up for school, and it only gets worse when they find out she's been in a traffic accident.
Ritsuki's in a foul mood as usual, but then she wonders if has Morita-san ever gotten mad?

title.jp: Everyone gets Part Time Jobs at Christmas

synopsis: It's Christmastime and Chihiro wants some extra cash, so she tries to get the girls to take part-time jobs at the local bakery. Selling cake in Santa outfits, what could go wrong?
When Miki and Chihiro get in a huge fight, Mayu tries to help patch things up.
